remarks: The non-unital ring homomorphisms between non-unital rings (in a universe) are a subcategory of the category of extensible structures. (Contributed by AV, 9-Mar-2020.)
statement:
rnghmsubcsetc.c $e |- C = ( ExtStrCat ` U ) $.
rnghmsubcsetc.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rnghmsubcsetc.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Rng i^i U ) ) $.
rnghmsubcsetc.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( RngHomo |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
rnghmsubcsetc $p |- ( ph -> H e. ( Subcat ` C ) ) $.
